segments.text: Mom , give me a glass of orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What the magic ward to say if you want something good to happen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry mom , i forgot.please give me a glass of orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is nice and cold , definitely good orange juice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Amy , you forgot another magic word .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry again , thank you mom .
segments.speaker: S1
